_header: Jesu Christ rightful Justice / King and lord over all kings
Note: Among them are five stanzas of 2905.
Title(s): An holy meditaciun and the Sauteer of Crystis Passiun
_description: ‘An holy meditaciun and the Sauteer of Crystis Passiun’ — sixty-three quatrains

BLEge3245.First Lines: Ihesu cryst ryhtful IustyseKyng and lord ouir alle kyngsis…
BLEge3245.Last Lines: …Ther welþe is euir with oute stryfTo that ioye lord þu me saue
BLEge3245.Attributed Title: Here beginniþ an holy meditaciun & the sauteer of crystis passiun
BLEge3245.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90: 379-85.
